member.name: IPreviewHandler.DoPreview
member.summary: Directs the preview handler to load data from the source specified in an earlier Initialize method call, and to begin rendering to the previewer window.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: IPreviewHandler.QueryFocus
member.summary: Directs the preview handler to return the HWND from calling the .
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the HWND returned from calling the from the preview handler's foreground thread.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPreviewHandler.SetFocus
member.summary: Directs the preview handler to set focus to itself.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPreviewHandler.SetRect
member.summary: Directs the preview handler to change the area within the parent hwnd that it draws into.
member.param: A pointer to a RECT to be used for the preview.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPreviewHandler.SetWindow
member.summary: Sets the parent window of the previewer window, as well as the area within the parent to be used for the previewer window.
member.param: A handle to the parent window.
A pointer to a RECT defining the area for the previewer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPreviewHandler.TranslateAccelerator
member.summary: Directs the preview handler to handle a keystroke passed up from the message pump of the process in which the preview handler is running.
member.param: A pointer to a window message.
member.returns: If the keystroke message can be processed by the preview handler, the handler will process it and return S_OK. If the preview handler cannot process the keystroke message, it will offer it to the host using . If the host processes the message, this method will return S_OK. If the host does not process the message, this method will return S_FALSE.

member.name: IPreviewHandler.Unload
member.summary: Directs the preview handler to cease rendering a preview and to release all resources that have been allocated based on the item passed in during the initialization.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPreviewHandler
member.summary: Exposes methods for the display of rich previews.
